parameters.subject: Oops - we need you to try again
parameters.html:
=

Hi {{ $json.data.resultData.runData.Webhook[0].data.main[0][0].json.body.USER_NAME }},

Something went wrong while generating your 1-Page Marketing Plan.

(Technology, right?)

The good news: It's an easy fix.

Click here to resubmit your information and generate your plan

It only takes 5 minutes, and you'll have your custom marketing plan in your inbox within 30 minutes.

If you continue to have issues, just reply to this email and we'll get you sorted out manually.

Thanks for your patience,
Allan
